{pages:['{"text":"My beloved Son!
If you are reading this, I\'m dead.

There\'s one thing, I want you to know: I love you, and always will be. Never ever forget about that no matter what happens.


 "}','{"text":"My son, here are a few pieces of advice you must also remember. I\'ve made mistakes and now I don\'t want you to make them too.

You\'ll soon become a soldier and I can imagine that you\'re not happy about that, and that\'s ok because you must always know"}','{"text":"what you\'re fighting for. Being a hero shall always be a matter of choice.

I can\'t say too much as I can\'t be sure who\'s gonna read this, but please, be patient and curious, find out who\'s the enemy and who isn\'t.
 "}','{"text":"Then just simply follow your heart.

I wish you a wonderful life.
Your dad."}'],title:"The last will",author:""}
